https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1v5zDTiYK5Kbnm760Tu0efQzNe2.jpg An injured figure skater is sent to the mountains to recover from an injury. Once there, she meets an ex-hockey player and his young daughter and begins to realise that something is missing from her life. A Snow Capped Christmas
